mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM orders WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND order_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
AND addresser_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{addresserName}, '%')
AND status = #{status}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, car_id, order_no, start_site, end_site, addresser_name, addresser_phone, addresser_card, recipients_name, recipients__phone, recipients__card, delivery_time, receipt_time, status, remark, is_deleted, creator_id, modifier_id, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresserCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipientsCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into orders
id,
car_id,
order_no,
start_site,
end_site,
addresser_name,
addresser_phone,
addresser_card,
recipients_name,
recipients__phone,
recipients__card,
delivery_time,
receipt_time,
status,
remark,
is_deleted,
creator_id,
modifier_id,
create_time,
modify_time,
